name: 陳涵秀
objective:
本課程分為兩大部分，其一為理論和議題的探究，自文化資產概念出發，探究文資保存範疇下的各項議題，包含有形無形文化保存的真實性、文化價值的差異與認定、詮釋與再現、資源管理和應用；其二為講授文化資產資源應用所需的研究方法和工具－田野調查；同時透過國內外文化資產的案例作分析與討論，深度檢視文化資產的多元面貌。
This course aims to understand the concept of heritage from the context of Taiwan and UNESCO. Different issues related to heritage preservation are discussed in this course, include the value and authenticity of tangible and intangible heritage, the representation and interpretation of culture and history, and reuse and management of cultural spaces. Moreover, fieldwork, the research methods of doing heritage preservation and resource management is also taught in this course. Finally, international case studies of heritage reuse and management are examined, to understand different ways of heritage practice.
schedule:
週次   課程內容
1.	What is heritage? With different translation / 什麼是文化資產？
2.  The development of cultural preservation in Taiwan. / 台灣的文化資產保存政策發展
3.  The heritage preservation under international context / 全球脈絡下的文化資產保存
4.  The history of Yehliu / 野柳的歷史發展
5.  Field trip to Yehliu and visit Yehliu elementary school. / 野柳移地教學
6.  Fieldwork I: Introduction / 關於田野調查的二三事
7.  Cultural analysis of Yehliu / 野柳文化分析
8.  Personal fieldwork practice and oral presentation / 個人五感觀察及分享
9.  Mid term: Oral presentation / 期中考
10.  Fieldwork II: Interview / 田野調查之深度訪談
11.  Fieldwork in Yehliu / 與野柳國小小學生討論他們的文化資產有哪些？
12.  The case studies of heritage preservation and management in Taiwan / 文化資產的保存與管理
13.  Fieldwork III: Participated Observation / 田野調查之參與式觀察
14.  Build cultural heritage preservation hall in Yeliu I / 建置野柳文化傳承基地 I
15.  Build cultural heritage preservation hall in Yeliu II / 建置野柳文化傳承基地 II
16.  The international case studies of cultural preservation and management / 文化保存和管理的國際案例分析
17.  Fieldwork and heritage resource management / 田野調查和文化資產資源的管理
18.  Conclusion / 綜合討論與檢討
